instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3475 High Fan spin
threads.message:
this laptop came with water damage got it to power on and everything works fine but the fan spin rises and stays loud. i tried 3 different smcs. 1 smc was from the model with less ram but of course it didnt work correctly although the fan speed stayed normal. then i tried 2 smcs of the same model board and fan spin stays high. Hardware monitor gives normal thermal readings only finstack and airport give 129 degrees but i read on other forums that airport showing 129 is normal and of course the finnstack as well im totally stuck.

any ideas??

threads.title: 820-3475 High Fan spin
threads.message: decided to use fan control software couldnt find a solution :(
